__e: As the saying goes, a picture says a thousand words but which words?
People say when you can't have what you want, the best you can do
People say that you don't really know what you have until it's gone, and maybe it almost took you being gone for me to realize it, but I love you.
Bob, there's an old saying... That the best psychiatrist in the world... Is the one right inside of you.
You do know that's just an expression, right?
Just because something rhymes doesn't mean it's true, 'cause I've definitely smelt what I know Titus dealt.
There's an old expression that has served me well:
I once heard this thing that always stuck with me
